Sentencas: We report on an excellent anode-supported H+-SOFC material system using a triple conducting (H+/O2-/e(-)) oxide (TCO) as a cathode material for H+-SOFCs.
Titulo: Triple-Conducting Layered Perovskites as Cathode Materials for Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Generally, mixed ionic (O2-) and electronic conductors (MIECs) have been selected as the cathode material of H+-SOFCs.
Titulo: Triple-Conducting Layered Perovskites as Cathode Materials for Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In an H+-SOFC system, however, MIEC cathodes limit the electrochemically active sites to the interface between the proton conducting electrolyte and the cathode.
Titulo: Triple-Conducting Layered Perovskites as Cathode Materials for Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: New approaches to the tailoring of cathode materials for H+-SOFCs should therefore be considered.
Titulo: Triple-Conducting Layered Perovskites as Cathode Materials for Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: TCOs can effectively extend the electrochemically active sites from the interface between the cathode and the electrolyte to the entire surface of the cathode.
Titulo: Triple-Conducting Layered Perovskites as Cathode Materials for Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The electrochemical performance of NBSCF/BZCYYb/BZCYYb-NiO shows excellent long term stability for 500h at 1023K with high power density of 1.61Wcm(-2).
Titulo: Triple-Conducting Layered Perovskites as Cathode Materials for Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
